citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between
4:30-5:00 p.m. on 06/19/2015.
I called the contact numbers that were available to me and left a voicemessage.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process between
4:30-5:00 p.m. on 06/19/2015.
I called the contact numbers that were available to me and left a voicemessage.
